resources.string: Create a Path.\nLink the Lume with the Light Bulb and press Play.
If the Path splits, the Lume splits.\nMake two Lumes reach the Light Bulb at the same time.
If the Path rejoins and two Lumes meet in that junction\nthey will merge and become one again.
The Path cannot touch red obstacles.
Try the buttons on the top of the screen.\nThey will be useful in the future.
Smaller light bulbs are Bonuses.\nTry to get them before reaching the main one.
The Lume that get the Bonus is not \nnecessarily the one that reaches the Light Bulb.
Symmetry can help you, but maybe you\nshould consider other than horizontal and vertical.
Remember, simmetry is not always good.
